title: The Dark Knight
plot_synopsis: The Dark Knight is the second installment in Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy and follows the story of Batman as he faces his greatest challenge yet: the Joker. When the Joker unleashes chaos and terror on Gotham City, Batman must confront his own beliefs and limitations to stop him. With the help of allies like Commissioner Gordon and district attorney Harvey Dent, Batman strives to protect the city from descending into darkness. However, the Joker's twisted games push Batman to his limits, forcing him to make impossible choices that will forever change Gotham's fate.
